title: With love, it is never enough
description: "With love, it is never enough" is a collection of poems and short stories dealing with man's life journey and his search for love and for truth. People of the generation who grew up in small towns and/or suburbs of big cities should relate to it mostly and should like it. Other people should also read it to understand what it was like growing up those days.
author: Suraj Kumar Oinam
